item.title: Convert String Case Easily in VS Code with this Extension
item.description: As developers, we all want to develop things fast. If you use Visual Studio Code (VS Code), you should know about extensions. Extensions are a very big part of turning an ordinary text editor into a super productive environment for coding. There so many extensions available on VS Code and it’s easy to build one if you have a part of your development workflow you’d love to optimize or automate.
